title: Advanced Mathematics Concept Mastery Through Productive Failure

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Calculus and Geometry
context.additional_context: Project-based learning for corporate managers/leaders in smartphone-centric environments, maximizing learning outcomes through formative assessment and iterative design improvements

learning_goals: Achieve mathematical modeling skills to solve volume calculation problems of solids of revolution with over 80% accuracy.
Design and implement a problem-solving process through peer feedback using constructivist learning strategies at least three times.
Discover and explain new mathematical concepts independently at least twice based on productive failure experiences.

resources: Offline Activity Kit (Graph Paper, Measurement Tools)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
